name: Velvet Green Salmon on Asparagus-Broccoli Nest
step_by_step: Blanch asparagus & broccoli 45 s, shock in ice
Blend spinach, avocado, egg yolk, cheese, olive oil into velvet sauce
Sear salmon skin-side 3 min, flip 2 min, rest
Warm sauce at 60 °C, fold in whipped egg white for air
Toss veg with chili, sunflower seeds, plate as nest
Set salmon on top, spoon sauce, finish with cheese shard
